job_description:
Job Role: Java Developer
Location: Atlanta, GA / Dallas, TX / Columbus, OH (Onsite)
Duration: 1+ Year Contract

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Strong proficiency in Java (8 or above)
Experience with Spring / Spring Boot
Hands-on experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, CloudWatch, etc.)


Regards
Yash Saini
----------------------------------
Next Level Business Services, Inc.
Talent Solutions | Digital Transformation | Data Analytics
E-mail: yash.saini@recruiter.nlbtech.com
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I am excited to express my interest in the Java Developer position based in Atlanta, GA. Having reviewed the job description, I am confident that my strong proficiency in Java, experience with Spring/Spring Boot, and hands-on knowledge of AWS services align well with the requirements of the role.

With over 5 years of experience in Java development, I have successfully designed and implemented scalable applications using Java 8 and above, Spring Boot, and AWS services like EC2, S3, and RDS. I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and collaborating effectively in team environments.

I have attached my updated resume for your review. I am eager to discuss how my skills and experiences can contribute to your team's success. Please let me know if there is any further information needed from my end.

Looking forward to the opportunity to discuss further.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
üö® We‚Äôre Hiring | Mid-Level Full Stack Developer üö®
üìç Location: Charlotte, NC
 üìù Interview: In-Person

We are looking for a Mid-Level Full Stack Developer with strong expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Reactive Programming, and Angular to join our growing team. This role offers an opportunity to work on scalable, high-performance applications in a collaborative environment.

üîπ Key Responsibilities:
 ‚Ä¢ Design and develop scalable applications using Core Java & J2EE
 ‚Ä¢ Build and maintain REST & SOAP Web Services

 ‚Ä¢ Work with Hibernate for database operations
 ‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, POCs, and performance optimization
 ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams and contribute to architecture decisions

üîπ Required Skills & Experience:
 ‚úî 8‚Äì10 years of experience in Java/J2EE, Spring Framework, Spring Boot
 ‚úî Strong hands-on experience with Java 11 / Java 17
 ‚úî Expertise in Reactive Programming & Spring WebFlux
 ‚úî years of Python experience
 ‚úî Frontend experience with Angular 11+ (13‚Äì16 preferred), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
 ‚úî Experience with Microservices, REST APIs
 ‚úî Exposure to AWS, GitHub, Jenkins, Agile/Scrum
 ‚úî Payments / Cards domain experience is a plus

üì§ If you or someone you know is interested, feel free to DM me or share your resume at mukund.sethiya@ktekresourcing.com

email_subject: Application for Mid-Level Full Stack Developer (Charlotte, NC)
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. Thank you for sharing the details of the Mid-Level Full Stack Developer position in Charlotte, NC. I am excited about the opportunity to join your team and contribute to the development of scalable applications.

Having 8 years of experience in Java, Spring Framework, and Spring Boot, I have successfully designed and developed RESTful APIs and microservices. My expertise in Reactive Programming and Java aligns well with the requirements of the role. Additionally, my experience with Angular, TypeScript, and HTML5 positions me well to contribute to frontend development.

I am particularly interested in collaborating with cross-functional teams, contributing to architecture decisions, and optimizing performance. I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong fit for this role.

I have attached my resume for your review. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my background aligns with your team's needs further.

job_description:

üìç Location: NYC, NY | Alpharetta, GA (Onsite)

7+ years of hands-on experience with Core Java & Spring Boot

üìß sikandercharak@hanstaffing.com

Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to express my genuine interest in the Senior Java Front Office Software Developer position in New York City.
